name: Technological Exchange
perks: Gain 5 Landsraad Standing on Council opening per active Truce
+2 Knowledge per active Truce

childs.name: Diplomatic Maneuvers
perks: Minor Houses deliver a House Gift near S-Vault after every Council
Unlocks the Political Agreement Treaty
Unlocks the Landsraad Quarters Building in S-Vault

childs.name: Counter Measures
perks: After every Council, receive 1 Landsraad Guard per 100 Influence spent, up to 3
+1 Agent slot in Counterintelligence

childs.name: Landsraad Support
perks: +50 max Influence per Agent assigned to a Landsraad Information slot
+1 Agent slot in Landsraad Information

childs.name: Insider Trading
perks: +20% CHOAM Share selling price
Selling CHOAM Shares grants 1 Influence per Share

childs.name: Heretical Computing
perks: Unlock Analytical Machine Agents and get 1 for free
Unlocks the Harmless Gadget Treaty
Unlocks the Intelligence Agency Building in S-Vault

childs.name: Stealth Gear
perks: 20% of and operation's Intel cost is refund when launched in the territory of a faction in Conflict
Enemies have -50% chance to detect missions

childs.name: Physical Wiring
perks: Infiltration Cells neighboring a region connected to the Nodal Network do no count towards the maximum of Infiltration Cells
Allows the training of Assassins

childs.name: Holistic Thinking
perks: +1 Knowledge per Information field with at least 1 Analytical Machine
Information increases by 1 level in factions that have accepted a Harmless Gadget
